chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:

Good evening, I have a problem with my delivery, order number 40494854.
I wasn't available at the delivery dates and now it will be sent back to you again. Is it perhaps possible to start another delivery attempt from May 27th? I've already tried using UPS, but it doesn't work. If you could send it via DHL, that would be great. That usually works much better for us.
Also, the package needs to be signed or a neighbor can accept and sign the package if necessary?

Best regards,
Tim Bartelheimer 

Thank you very much for your help,

Hello,  

The customer's package could not be delivered.  

Could you please contact the shipping company and ask them to send the package back to you? 

Brücker Mauspfad 199, 51109 Köln

After receiving the package, please resend it to the customer.  

Regards, 
Aysah, from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We take note and will wait for the parcel to be returned to us before attempting delivery again. Unfortunately, we are unable to change couriers but can I confirm the details of the customer to ensure a smoother delivery attempt? 

Klaus Bartelheimer
Brücker Mauspfad 199
51109 Köln , DE
01637658157

Regarding a delivery to neighbours, if the recipient wishes, we will inform the courier to deliver the parcel to a neighbour.

Regards,
RK

Hello,

Yes, the address is correct, please also inform the shipping company. 

Klaus Bartelheimer/ Tim Bartelheimer
Brücker Mauspfad 199
51109 Köln
Deutschland
1637658157
tim.bartelheimer@gmail.com

If the customer is not at home, let them leave the package with the neighbours.

Regards,
Aysah, from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We are still awaiting for the parcel to arrive. I will inform the shipping company once we received the parcel. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear Backcare,

The parcel has been shipped and the customer's request has been relayed to the courier. The tracking number is 1ZBF1560D901148353

Regards,
RK
